snippet: Franco Di Santo claimed a 17-minute hat trick as Schalke beat Asteras Tripoli, 4-0, in the Europa League.
abstract: Schalke defeats Asteras Tripoli FC, 4-0, in Europa League; other soccer results noted.
lead_paragraph: Franco Di Santo claimed a 17-minute hat trick as Schalke beat Asteras Tripoli, 4-0, in the Europa League.

headline.print_headline: Hat Trick Propels Schalke to Victory
headline.main: Hat Trick Propels Schalke to Victory
